snippet: President Obama chose veteran diplomats on Tuesday to fill two of the most sensitive overseas posts.
abstract: President Obama plans to nominate James B Cunningham, deputy envoy in Kabul, to be the new ambassador to Afghanistan and another member of the Kabul embassy staff, Richard G Olson, to be the new ambassador to Pakistan.
lead_paragraph: President Obama chose veteran diplomats on Tuesday to fill two of the most sensitive overseas posts.

headline.seo: Obama Picks New Ambassadors for Afghanistan and Pakistan
headline.main: Obama Picks Diplomats for Afghanistan and Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Diplomats for Afghanistan And Pakistan Are Chosen
